@mustii34 all copies will not play on ps3 or any other device with cinavia.
Blu-ray/media players that use Cinavia: 
* Sony Playstation 3 (PS3) firmware 3.10 or higher 
* Pioneer BDP-V6000 
* Marantz UD5005 
* LG BDP550 (fw: 8.31.283.C) 
* Denon DBP-1611UD 
 try running the same file on a pc, it'll work fine.
